attributes.action: ban music older than 15 yrs from broadcast in the work place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it has come to my attention that there are many old folk still being forced to work and all they do is moan about modern music and whenever the radio or wireless is left unattended, instantly re-tune to saga or classic fm. 
you the government are trying to encourage the youth of today to seek employment yet you let this travesty continue. 
please reduce the working age to a maximum of 50. if the retired persons cannot afford to maintain a standard of living then please authorise euthanasia.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
